{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  <SELLER>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder</SELLER>
  <OFFERINGS>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT>
      <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
      <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>
      <PRIZE_UNBOUND>46. kr.</PRIZE_UNBOUND>
      <PRIZE_BOUND>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE_BOUND>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE_UNBOUND>6. Batzen</PRIZE_UNBOUND>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRICE>12. Batzen</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Gespräch von den Wärmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
      <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
  </OFFERINGS>
  <NOTE>viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</NOTE>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":18,"explanation":"The input was a stringified JSON containing an XML fragment, not valid XML itself. I first extracted the XML content. The XML was heavily malformed, using non-standard characters (like \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u00a7, \u221a\u00b4) which I corrected to standard German characters (e.g., ß, ö, ä, long s representation cleanup). I standardized tag usage: replaced `<PRIZE>` with more specific tags like `<PRIZE_UNBOUND>` and `<PRIZE_BOUND>` where context implied different states. I introduced structural tags like `<SELLER>`, `<OFFERINGS>`, and `<NOTE>` to better organize the sales listing content logically, moving the initial 'Bey Herrn...' to `<SELLER>` and separating the final explanatory phrase into `<NOTE>`. I standardized repeating attributes like format '8v\u221a\u2264.' to '8vo.'."}
